keyMoments.title: Buffalo's Anime Debut
keyMoments.description: Buffalo makes his first appearance in the anime, flying toward Punk Hazard with Baby 5 riding on his back using his Devil Fruit abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Buffalo as a member of the Donquixote Pirates and showcases his role as Doflamingo's subordinate.

keyMoments.title: Guru Guru no Mi Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Buffalo demonstrates his Guru Guru no Mi ability by transforming his body parts into propellers for flight and wind generation.
keyMoments.significance: First showcase of Buffalo's Devil Fruit powers in the anime.

keyMoments.title: Wind Dispersal Technique
keyMoments.description: Buffalo spins rapidly to create a massive gust of wind that disperses the poisonous H2S gas around Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Buffalo's utility and combat applications of his Devil Fruit.

abilities.description: Buffalo transforms parts of his body into propellers to achieve flight and carry passengers.
Buffalo spins his body rapidly to create powerful gusts of wind capable of dispersing gas and objects.

relationships.description: Buffalo and Baby 5 work together as a team within the Donquixote Pirates, often partnering on missions.

evolutionMoments.description: Buffalo and Baby 5 travel together to Punk Hazard on Doflamingo's orders.

relationships.description: Buffalo serves as a loyal officer in the Donquixote Pirates, taking orders directly from Doflamingo.

evolutionMoments.description: Buffalo contacts Doflamingo to report Caesar's status and receives new orders.

reveals.information: Ate the Guru Guru no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to spin body parts like propellers
Officer in the Donquixote Pirates serving under Pica's command
Works as an assassin and combatant for Doflamingo

keyMoments.title: Baby 5's Fiancé History Revealed
keyMoments.description: Baby 5 reveals that Doflamingo has killed all eight of her past fiancés and destroyed their hometowns.
keyMoments.significance: Provides insight into Baby 5's troubled romantic history and Doflamingo's controlling nature over his crew.
keyMoments.quote: Joker killed all eight of my fiancés!

keyMoments.title: Finding Caesar's Body
keyMoments.description: Baby 5 and Buffalo discover Caesar Clown's unconscious body after it's ejected from the facility.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the conflict over Caesar's custody between Doflamingo's crew and the Straw Hats.

relationships.description: Baby 5 serves Doflamingo loyally despite his controlling and violent interference in her personal life, including killing her fiancés.

evolutionMoments.description: Baby 5's troubled relationship with Doflamingo is revealed through her complaints about him killing her eight fiancés.

reveals.information: Had eight fiancés who were all killed by Doflamingo, with their hometowns destroyed

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Carrying Mocha to Safety
keyMoments.description: Chopper, along with the G-5 medical squad, carries the weakened Mocha toward Building R-66, racing to reach safety before the poisonous gas spreads.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's dedication to his medical duties and protecting the children.

keyMoments.title: Rescuing Petrified Kin'emon
keyMoments.description: Brook carries the petrified body of Kin'emon, who was caught in toxic gas while searching for his son, toward the evacuation point.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Kin'emon's eventual rescue and reunion with Momonosuke.

name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: Ordering Caesar's Recovery
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo receives Buffalo's report about Caesar's defeat and immediately changes their mission to recovering Caesar and returning to Dressrosa.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict and demonstrates Doflamingo's strategic response to the crisis.
keyMoments.quote: Change of plans. Retrieve Caesar and return to Dressrosa immediately.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo's Confident Smile
keyMoments.description: Upon learning Caesar's body has been located, Doflamingo smiles knowingly about continuing SAD production.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows Doflamingo's continued antagonistic role and his plans for the SMILE trade.

reveals.information: Doflamingo's controlling nature over his crew is revealed through Baby 5's complaints about him killing her fiancés
